text: A pedometer is an electronic device for counting the steps of its user. == History == Leonardo da Vinci thought that the pedometer would intend for military purposes.Leonardo da Vinci (1938). Edward MacCurdy (ed.). The Notebooks of Leonardo Da Vinci. New York: Reynal & Hitchcock. p. 166. ==References== Category:Measuring tools Category:Fitness
title: Pedometer
